title: Film a Video for ‘The Ultimate Singletrack Contest,’ Win $13k in Prizes from BC Bike Race
content:
Organizers of the annual BC Bike Race announced a new contest based on video submissions, with the winner getting free entry and other prizes.

The post Film a Video for ‘The Ultimate Singletrack Contest,’ Win $13k in Prizes from BC Bike Race appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew McLemore
